text: Baluna, amara imana enechi allahara upara ebam ya kichu abatirna hayeche amadera upara, ibrahima, isama'ila, isahaka, iyakuba ebam tamdera santanabargera upara ara ya kichu peyechena musa o isa ebam an'yan'ya nabi rasulagana tamdera palanakartara paksa theke. Amara tamdera karo madhye parthakya kari na. Ara amara tamra'i anugata.
